title: Drugs and the FDA: Safety, Efficacy, and the Public's Trust | MIT Press eBooks | IEEE Xplore
description: How the FDA was shaped by public health crises and patient advocacy, told against a background of the contentious hearings on the breast cancer drug Avastin. Fo
